alert.note: Alert for Greene; Madison; Pickaway (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 01 at 8:25PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF FAYETTE, NORTHEASTERN CLINTON, WESTERN PICKAWAY, SOUTHEASTERN GREENE AND SOUTHEASTERN MADISON COUNTIES THROUGH 900 PM EST... At 824 PM EST, a strong thunderstorm was located near Sabina, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Washington Court House, Sabina, Mount Sterling, Jeffersonville, Williamsport, Bloomingburg, New Holland, Bowersville, Darbyville, Milledgeville, Octa, Melvin, Deer Creek Lake, Chenoweth, Interstate 71 at State Route 38, Derby, Rosemoor, Bloomington, Jasper Mills and Reesville. This includes I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 57 and 89. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
